name: Full Swiss Economy Pipeline
description: Full lifecycle: Load, Filter, Transform, Map to RDF, and GraphDB Publish.
definition: {"steps":[{"id":"load","operation":"load-csv","parameters":{"file":"/app/swiss_economy.csv","hasHeader":true}},{"id":"filter","operation":"filter","parameters":{"condition":"item.population > 1000000"},"inputs":["load"]},{"id":"map","operation":"map","parameters":{"function":"item => { item.gdp = parseFloat(item.gdp_millions); item.population = parseInt(item.population); return item; }"},"inputs":["filter"]},{"id":"rdf","operation":"map-to-rdf","parameters":{"baseUri":"https://example.org/stats/observation/","subjectTemplate":"{canton}-{year}","typeUri":"http://purl.org/linked-data/cube#Observation","propertyMappings":{"year":"http://example.org/property/year","canton":"http://example.org/property/canton","population":"http://example.org/property/population","gdp":"http://example.org/property/gdp"}},"inputs":["map"]},{"id":"publish","operation":"graph-store-put","parameters":{"endpoint":"http://graphdb:7200/repositories/rdf-forge/statements","graph":"https://example.org/graph/swiss-economy","format":"turtle"},"inputs":["rdf"]}]}
